thread.title: Professor Hiroshi Kimura Receives 2015 Robert Feulgen Prize (Tokyo Institute of Technology)
thread.title_full: Professor Hiroshi Kimura Receives 2015 Robert Feulgen Prize (Tokyo Institute of Technology) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Professor Hiroshi Kimura Receives 2015 Robert Feulgen Prize (Tokyo Institute of Technology)
text: ( Source : Tokyo Institute of Technology ) Tokyo Tech Professor Hiroshi Kimura of the Graduate School of Bioscience and Biotechnology has received the 2015 Robert Feulgen Prize. Kimura gave a special lecture about his research at the 24th
